title: BRIEF-Syros Announces Appointment Of Joseph J. Ferra As Chief Financial Officer
text: March 12, 2018 / 11:10 AM / in 8 minutes BRIEF-Syros Announces Appointment Of Joseph J. Ferra As Chief Financial Officer Reuters Staff March 12 (Reuters) - Syros Pharmaceuticals Inc: * SYROS ANNOUNCES APPOINTMENT OF JOSEPH J. FERRA AS CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER * SYROS PHARMACEUTICALS INC - ‍FERRA MOST RECENTLY SERVED AS MANAGING DIRECTOR AND CO-HEAD OF HEALTHCARE INVESTMENT BANKING AT JMP SECURITIES​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
